task.title: Task: Plot Area
task.shortdesc: Options to make a chart with a colored background or border.

context.p: The plot area in a chart refers to a rectangular area of the chart that graphically displays the data being charted. The plot area is the area bounded by the axes, It includes the axes but not the titles. You can format the plot area for example with a colored background and border.

step.cmd: Select the plot area, right-click and choose Format Plot Area
step.stepresult: Task panel Format Plot Area is displayed.

step.cmd: Open option Fill and select Solid fill with a light grey color.
Open option Border and select Solid line with black color.
